items.value:
The inventor of BSODA himself!
Watch out, or he'll spray you with it!
He might not talk, but his actions speak louder!
Eveyone's Bsodaa's greatest pal! She makes sure he always has soda on him! DON'T steal from her!

Diet BSODA Mini
For budgeting (and balancing) reasons, we have made Diet BSODA available
in sip-sized cans! Now the healthier alternative is in smaller capacity for short bursts!

BSODA Mini
The original fizzed-up BSODA in a sip-sized can!
Leverage the slightly lower speed with the EXTRA fizz!
You can grab up to three Diet BSODAs from the Bsodaa Helper if she sees you as faculty!
The Bsodaa Helper doesn't like getting sprayed by (regular) BSODA. If that happens, she'll then have only Diet BSODA next floor!
